title: Japan will connect Northeast India to the Bay of Bengal: Dy Foreign Minister Horii Iwao
content:
Japan intends to connect Northeast India to the Bay of Bengal.
*   The initiative aims to provide the region with access to a vital sea route.
*   This plan was announced by Japan's Deputy Foreign Minister, Horii Iwao.

title: District panchayat Budget proposes jobs for 5,000 women
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   The District panchayat's new Budget includes a proposal for job creation.
*   It specifically aims to generate 5,000 new employment opportunities.
*   These positions are designated for women.

title: Kochi Corporation Budget approved amid Opposition boycott
content:
The Kochi Corporation's budget has been officially approved.
*   This approval took place during a session that was boycotted.
*   The boycott was carried out by the Opposition.

title: Tamil Nadu launches its first Dark Sky Park in Kolli Hills for stargazing
content:
Here are 3 bullet points summarizing the headline:

*   Tamil Nadu has launched its first Dark Sky Park in Kolli Hills.
*   The park is specifically designed for stargazing activities.
*   This initiative marks a new development for the state in promoting astrotourism and light pollution awareness.

title: PM Modi to launch nationwide HPV vaccination drive on February 28
content:
Here are 3 bullet points summarizing the headline:

*   Prime Minister Modi will launch a nationwide Human Papillomavirus (HPV) vaccination drive.
*   The initiative aims to provide HPV vaccination across the entire country.
*   The official launch of the drive is scheduled for February 28.

title: Arvind Kejriwal’s court discharge a blow to Union government: Kerala Chief Minister
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal has received a court discharge.
*   Kerala's Chief Minister stated that this development is a "blow" to the Union government.
*   The remark highlights political criticism and tension surrounding the central government's actions.

title: Didn’t pay influencers to oppose AI Summit, says Congress
content:
Congress has denied allegations that it paid influencers.
*   These payments were supposedly made to mobilize opposition against an AI Summit.
*   The statement clarifies Congress's position amidst speculation regarding their involvement in public dissent against the event.

title: Karnataka launches action plan on snakebite and rabies; aims to cut snakebite deaths by half, end dog-related rabies deaths by 2030
content:
Karnataka has launched a new action plan to combat snakebite and rabies.
*   The initiative aims to reduce snakebite deaths by 50%.
*   It also targets eliminating all dog-related rabies deaths by the year 2030.

title: Bicycle literacy campaign launched in women’s college
content:
A bicycle literacy campaign has been launched.
*   The initiative is specifically targeting students at a women's college.
*   It aims to educate women on various aspects of cycling.

title: Police book unknown motorcyclist for transporting explosives
content:
Police have booked an unknown individual.
*   The person was identified as a motorcyclist.
*   The booking is for transporting explosives.
